display_name: Obstructive Apnea-Hypopnea Index: (obstructive apneas with no oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or without arousal+ hypopneas with > 30% flow reduction and >= 3% oxygen desaturation or with arousal) / hour of sleep
calculation: 60 * (hremba3 + hroa3 + hnrba3 + hnroa3 + urbpa3 + uropa3 + unrbpa3 + unropa3 + oarbp + oarop + oanbp + oanop ) / slpprdp
